body_html: Thanks : ) Someone asked me if I could have solved this issue by simply removing the new_session_path method. Well, I tried this and got a no method error. In this documentation, it is stated that if you are using only omniauth authentication, you have to define this method on your application controller.
body_text: Thanks : ) Someone asked me if I could have solved this issue by simply removing the new_session_path method. Well, I tried this and got a no method error. In this documentation, it is stated that if you are using only omniauth authentication, you have to define this method on your application controller.
body: Thanks : ) Someone asked me if I could have solved this issue by simply removing the new_session_path method. Well, I tried this and got a no method error. In [this](https://github.com/plataformatec/devise/wiki/OmniAuth:-Overview) documentation, it is stated that if you are using only omniauth authentication, you have to define this method on your application controller.
